articles.description: MIT has developed a robot that navigates around spaces to blast the virus with UV light. The team has even tested the system at a Boston-area food bank with encouraging results.
articles.content: The United States is currently experiencing a surge in COVID-19 cases as states begin dropping restrictions and allowing businesses to open once again. With people venturing outside and returning to … [+2325 chars]

articles.title: Apple Design Awards celebrates 2020's most innovative iOS apps - Cult of Mac
articles.description: Apple has announced the winners of its Apple Design Award trophies. Apple says these apps show outstanding design, innovation, and more.
articles.content:
The eight winners of this years Apple Design Awards showcase outstanding app design, innovation, ingenuity, and technical achievement, the company said Monday.

articles.title: 'Cyberpunk 2077': New gameplay features and braindance editor revealed - Micky News

articles.description: Twitch has permanently banned Guy Beahm, aka Dr Disrespect from their platform. Dr Disrespect is somewhat controversial and has been banned before.
